thread.title: Georgia makes cut for four-star LB
thread.title_full: Georgia makes cut for four-star LB

title: Georgia makes cut for four-star LB
text: Manage Georgia makes cut for four-star LB Four-star linebacker Payton Wilson (Hillsborough, N.C./Orange) has not been mentioned much when it comes to the University of Georgia, but the Bulldogs appear to be a Slot to Georgia Links Four-star linebacker Payton Wilson (Hillsborough, N.C./Orange) has not been mentioned much when it comes to the University of Georgia, but the Bulldogs appear to be a contender for his commitment. On Tuesday, Wilson narrowed down his offers to seven. Georgia made the list, along with Alabama, Clemson, Ohio State, Penn State, North Carolina, and Virginia Tech. Not a member? Try a seven-day FREE trial to VIP access to Dawgs247! The 6-foot-4, 220-pound Wilson was one of the biggest risers in the latest Class of 2018 rankings by 247Sports. He now sits at No. 34 overall in the country and the No. 2 outside linebacker nationally. The 247Sports Composite rankings have him as the No 197 overall prospect and the No. 10 outside linebacker. Georgia has a commitment from four-star outside linebacker Adam Anderson (Rome, Ga./Rome), and several other highly-rated linebackers think highly of the Bulldogs, including four-star edge rusher Brenton Cox (Stockbridge, Ga./Stockbridge). (What's next for the Bulldogs? Make sure you're in the loop -- take a few moments to sign up for our FREE Bulldogs Newsletter! ) Author
